Headline: Temporary #7 Harrison Reroute near Damen/Polk.
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted near Damen/Polk.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Damen/Polk.

Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, Western, Jackson, Loomis, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Western buses will operate via Harrison, Loomis, Van Buren, Western, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at Pulaski. 


Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.
